sentences.sContent: ...a country of nomads who raise cattle and camels.
sentences.sCn: ...一个饲养牛和骆驼的游牧国家。

remMethod.val: no + mad → 游牧民安定不下来并不是因为他们是疯子， 而是民族习惯使然 → 游牧民

trans.tranOther: a member of a tribe that travels from place to place instead of living in one place all the time, usually in order to find grass for their animals
